resources.mandatory_materials:
1.	Physical rehabilitation of the injured athlete/(edited by) J. R Andrews. Philadelphia: Elsevier Saunders, 2012, 4th ed.
2.	Rehabilitation of the hand and upper extremity. Volume 2. (edited by) T. M. Skirven. Philadelphia: Elsevier Mosby 2011.
3.	Athletic and sport issues in musculoskeletal rehabilitation. Editors D. J Magee. St Louis: Elsevier Saunder 2011.
4.	Sports medicine and rehabilitation: a sport-specific approach. Edited by R. M. Buschbacher, N. D. Prahlow, S. J Dave. Philadelphia: Wolters Kluwer Health/Lippincott Williams &Wilkins 2009.
5.	The psychology of sport injury and rehabilitation. Edited by M Arvinen-Barrow and N Walker. London: New York, Routledge. 2013
resources.recommended_materials:
1.	Rehabilitation and physical therapy. Editors by D:J. Marcellin-Little, D Levine, D.L.Millis. Philadelphia: Elsevier. 2015.
2.	Rehabilitation for the postsurgical orthopaedic patient. L Maxey, J Magnusson. St Louis: Elsevier Mosby. 2013.
3.	Spinal control: the rehabilitation of back pain: state of the art and science . P W. Hodges, J. Cholewicki, J. H. Van Dieen Edinburgh. Churchill Livingstone Elsevier. 2013.
